__TOC__

Come join your fellow CNY Ubuntu enthusiasts as we celebrate the release of 10.10 "Maverick Meerkat". The event will host Talks, installs/upgrades, and features an onsite Ubuntu repository. The event will feature a live webcam feed and coincide with the launch party taking place in Manhattan and Rochester.

The event is open and free to the public. Come share and explore opensource with your friends and neighbors. All are welcome.
